title: Can I get banned for spamming random letter in chat?
body: As the title says one game I got a little tilted and basically slammed the keyboard so it made random letters come up. I did this 2-3 times and am worried I will get banned. Can anyone tell me if I can do I’m not constantly worried about a ban.

replies.body: Yes you can lol. "not a constructive use for chat. It is used to encourage strategy"
AS long as the letters didn't spell out an auto-ban word, you should be fine
If it was only a few times you have nothing to worry about. If you were doing it all game it might be different.
